channel.title: How come my friend is getting error connecting to server?
channel.description: hey a friend of mine downloaded a client of mine i uploaded he can open client good etc.. but he get's a error connecting to server? why is this? my server is online right now and im on it perfectly. i checked with no-ip and it shows that im not or my virus or firewall isnt blocking the port out so idk whats wrong?

item.title: How come my friend is getting error connecting to server?
item.dc:creator: @joelx617 joelx617
item.description:
@joelx617 wrote:

hey a friend of mine downloaded a client of mine i uploaded he can open client good etc… but he get’s a error connecting to server? why is this? my server is online right now and im on it perfectly. i checked with no-ip and it shows that im not or my virus or firewall isnt blocking the port out so idk whats wrong?
